mapper.sql: t1.id as "id" ,t1.account as "account" ,t1.pwd as "pwd" ,t1.channel_name as "channelName" ,t1.channeltype as "channeltype" ,t1.gender as "gender" ,t1.phone1 as "phone1" ,t1.phone2 as "phone2" ,t1.fax as "fax" ,t1.birthday as "birthday" ,t1.marital_status as "maritalStatus" ,t1.id_no as "idNo" ,t1.income as "income" ,t1.inc_verifiable as "incVerifiable" ,t1.other_income as "otherIncome" ,t1.other_income_src as "otherIncomeSrc" ,t1.self_fico as "selfFico" ,t1.cumulative_job_tenure as "cumulativeJobTenure" ,t1.education_level as "educationLevel" ,t1.tax as "tax" ,t1.own_car_num as "ownCarNum" ,t1.own_house_num as "ownHouseNum" ,t1.children_status as "childrenStatus" ,t1.children_num as "childrenNum" ,t1.asset_other as "assetOther" ,t1.debt_status as "debtStatus" ,t1.wechat as "wechat" ,t1.qq as "qq" ,t1.remark as "remark" ,t1.work_start_date as "workStartDate" ,t1.domicile_live_diff as "domicileLiveDiff" ,t1.date_created as "dateCreated" ,t1.relation as "relation" ,t1.staff_no as "staffNo" ,t1.address as "address" ,t1.bi_update_ts as "biUpdateTs" ,t1.staus as "staus" ,t1.del_flag as "delFlag"
mapper.select:
select
from channel_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select
from channel_info t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from channel_info t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc
